config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code retrieves the CSS media of the user agent by checking a key in the hints map. If the key is found, it returns the value associated with it. Otherwise, it falls back to the superclass method to get the media.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getMedia() method is called in the system. The frequency of triggering depends on how often this method is invoked.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is minimal as it mainly affects the CSS media of the user agent. It does not have a significant impact on the overall system functionality.
